QuestData.Title: 10,000 Years of Roasting
QuestData.Description:
Spices? Oh! Ya must be with da big 'ol dragon cook. Da one with a little duck chef on her head.
Djaradin collect up a powder, Spicy Lava Spices, off da fiery elementals down below.
Don' you look at me like dat! It's what da Djaradin be calling dem, not me!
Good luck down there. I wouldn't go alone if was you.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Rumiastrasza at The Ruby Feast in Valdrakken.
